title: Unspecified error while downloading client
body: I recently had a clean install of windows and was trying to get League on my computer but keep getting this issue. I tried as admin and also switched from hard drive to ssd and back but it does not download on either of the two.

replies.body: With a reinstall, it's really important to update your OS to make sure it has all the necessary products!  This specific error though can vary depending on when it's happening.  Let me know at what % you're getting this error, and I'll help get you updated!
Almost instantly it does this. it scans the files and calculates difference, and then it will download for about 20 seconds and give me the error. It is still at 0%.

That helps a ton, thanks dude!  This early on, your patcher is trying to read and prepare your game files before even downloading anything, but it doesn't have permission.  You'll want to go voer each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure league is added as an exception and allowed to update.  That should do it!
Did all of these and still getting the error

these are the most recent logs that pop up with errors

That's really weird, it sounds like access still isn't being allowed somehow.  In that case, submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech guys will work with you to figure this out.

Grab some logs as well with our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) for more context, and we'll dig a bit deeper.  See you there!
